title: Coronavirus tracker: Sinovac unveils midstage vaccine data; Daewoong OK'd to test tapeworm med against virus
author: Eric Sagonowsky; Angus Liu; Kyle Blankenship; Conor Hale; Fraiser Kansteiner
description: China's Sinovac kicked off a coronavirus vaccine trial in Indonesia and revealed promising data on its candidate from a mid-stage study. | Sinovac kicked off a COVID-19 vaccine trial in Indonesia, a day after revealing midstage data from China. South Korea's Daewoong got the OK to test a tapeworm drug against the virus. Researchers in the U.S. think the antidepressant Luvox could curb cytokine storm. And Switzerland called dibs on an experimental COVID-fighter from Molecular Partners.
